name: A bit of light
description:
A bit of light is a game developed for the Games Aid Mental Health Jam. Follow the life of our little protagonist as the weekend unfolds. Spend your time wisely and make every activity count. As you make choices, you'll see how your head fills with positive or negative thoughts, so make sure you also try to rest a bit so your head doesn't clutter. Try to find the four different endings!

Credits:

Marta Adelantado: Art, narrative and game design

David Villegas: Programming and game design

Jaime Povar: Sound design and original music
